abstrac: Professional PCB designs, IoT, and embedded hardware development
bio:
I was a tinkerer as a kid, always fixing or taking something apart and putting it back together. I've not stopped learning since, and in the years that followed spent a lot of time working with embedded systems and product development. It's now been more than three decades, and I've acquired some rather unique skills along the way in electro-optics, RF/wireless, embedded, and harsh environment systems. I still get a kick out of making gadgets work, work better, or create new ones, and I enjoy every aspect of my work, from brainstorming to production. If it's not apparent, I like what I do. I've had the opportunity to work in the Mil-Aero, Industrial, Automotive, Bio-Medical and Life Science sectors. Thank you for taking the time to consider me for your electrical engineering or product development needs, whatever your line of business may be.

I have always worked very interactively with my customers and strive to deliver embedded design services that meet or exceed their needs and specifications. Where there is ambiguity, I assume one of the reasons I've been hired is for my experience. I'm always willing to make design recommendations for performance, cost, or other trade-offs, but your vision for the product will always take priority regarding any such decisions. My general approach is to work with you to understand your exact needs, develop a solution that you are happy with, build and test it if requested, and finally, modify the design where necessary should the product behave differently than expected.

PRODUCT DEFINITION
 - System Engineering, System Architecture, and Trade Studies
 - Block Diagrams, State Machine Definition, and Flow Charts

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT
 - Circuit Design and Schematic Capture
 - Bills of Material and Part Sourcing
 - Printed Circuit Board Layout and Manufacturing Data
 - Assembly and Fabrication Drawings
 - Prototyping
We are an agile team that is available 24/7 to answer your questions.

bio:
Vast experience creating Smart Android and iOS Apps. I create from Basic stand-alone Apps to Apps that are part of a very sophisticated Enterprise Solution. No App or System is too small.

For the Telemarketing Industry I created Call Centers, CRM, Dialers for Phone, Text Message and Email campaigns.

In 2010 I created my first AI (Artificial Intelligence) system which was used for Email campaigns.

In 2011 I created my first TeleHealth System. A complete Enterprise Solution with App for Patients and Nurses, Web Server, Doctor's Web Portal, Database Server and API Server.

In 2020 I created my first Voice AI System to answer Phone Calls to help patients with their Orders or Questions about their Hearing Aid devices. I used IBM and Google to add  AI to our IVR System. All my systems are able to interact with users via Voice and Text conversion (Chat).

Our Apps, both Android and iOS, are part of the Eco System we create for all our Enterprise Solutions. Custom Made API Servers are the Spinal Cord that connects everything together.

Our systems also speak different languages upon request.

Thank you for your consideration.

Carlos Bieberach
Miami, Florida USA

bio:
Web Cafe provides professional web development services. We can handle anything from innovative web development to the classic website development and provide you with the highest quality results.

Web development requires different technologies. Depending on your business needs and marketing expectations, our dedicated experts will provide you with in-depth analysis of the problem and suggest effective solutions for every stage of the project.
With over two successful decades in IT, our team is comfortable with a bunch of frontend and backend technologies and frameworks and ready to boost your ideas to the market by the means of any of them or even combine a suitable mix of appropriate tools:

- PHP: One of the most popular programming languages for its ease­-of­-use. We are comfortable with frameworks and packages like Laravel, Symfony, Zend, etc. 
- Javascript: We use Javascript to develop flexible, scalable websites and applications. Its frameworks and libraries have a great potential for effective frontend and backend solutions. We have got a proven expertise in Native Javascript, AngularJS, ReactJS, Backbone.js ExtJS, Node.js, etc.
- CMS: Our developers work on an expert level with WordPress. We have also developed our own framework that lets us build scalable websites on WordPress platform.
Java: Our software engineers can use Java to create business multifunctional systems for you.
- .Net: This technology integrates with Windows and is supported by Microsoft and is widely used for website development.

During the last period we have accomplished a vast number of projects and gained strong skills with many domains. Here is a brief list of some of them: education, banking, healthcare, e-commerce, advertisement, etc.

Below are some the most popular requests from our clients:
- Websites (dynamic and modern looking) and SPA
- Landing pages (easy to navigate, with vivid UX/UI)
- E-commerce websites
- Web portals etc.

Website: http://webcafe.ae

Escrow or non-escrow projects. Non-escrow project terms are 25-50% up front with the remainder due upon completion.

If you have an existing product or just an idea of it, we will suggest and execute the best IT solution for you, even if it combines multiple technologies.

Contact us and we’ll do utmost to solve your business challenges and become your reliable IT partner.

bio:
Tulip Infotech has been creating state of art web and mobile app based applications for 10 years. We have designed numbers of websites and web-based applications for companies of all sizes. We ensure the quality of work is maintained throughout the entire development process for 100% client satisfaction

Tulip Infotech team holds skills from professionals, including industry specific application developers, mobile app developers and web designers.

At Tulip Infotech our development team represents one of the leading resources for innovative and sophisticated web-based solutions. Our designing team always keeps on exploring interesting layouts and combinations, user-friendliness. All in all, we search for what looks good.


How We initiate to work - 
------------------------
Based on our experience in this business, we have designed our development policies towards executing high-quality solutions for reasonable costs. Here are some of our main principles:

Comprehensive design specifications for all projects.
Expert management 
Use of the latest technologies 
Extensive testing by our in-house Testing workforce 

OUR EXPERTISE:

* Mobile Development: Android & iOS (Ionic, PhoneGap, Native, Core)
* PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Wordpress, Opencart, Magento, Shopify

The business that makes nothing but money is a poor business, that is what we know and is the base of our business relationships.

Our time availability is around 17 hours .
I am online from 10 am to 7 pm IST everyday.
But please leave your query and I will reply in under 6 hours. 

----------------------------------------
Projects over $1000 budget
----------------------------------------
30% release with project initiation.
Rest milestones will be based on work bifurcation mentioned in milestone details.
Escrow of next milestone will be required with release of current.
Delivery will be made with final payment.

Projects equal or under $1000:
---------------------------------------------------------
-- 30% release with project initiation.
-- 50% on work completion but before final delivery.
-- 20% on final approval
Therefore mentioned milestones are set after thorough discussion with our clients. These are, nevertheless, are open to FAIR negotiation. We shall sign a standard NDA on request. We will provide 30 days free technical support, after delivery.
